VIII.ii.1.C.4.a
.
Establishing an Effective Date for Undiagnosed Illness and MUCMI Claims
When assigning an effective date, follow the guidance in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 4.A
relevant to the facts of the claim.
In addition to the general principles governing the assignment of effective dates, consider the following relevant factors when awarding SC for an undiagnosed illness or MUCMI:
Did the Veteran’s service qualify under
38 CFR 3.317(e)(2)
or under a location added in
38 U.S.C. 1117
?
Was the qualifying disability manifest to a compensable degree?
